channel.title: Safe zones and pk zones
channel.description: I have looked at many tutorials and im pretty muched stucked. I want a safe zone in fallador bank but dont know how im suppose to do that. I already attempt to put wildy all over fallador but got no safe zone. If you can help, please post!

item.title: Safe zones and pk zones
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

It works with runesource but converting it only uses the fundamentals of general programming.

item.title: Safe zones and pk zones
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:2, topic:533315”]Convert this to work with your source, this makes all banks safe and anything beyond the bank is pvp.

public boolean inBank() {
return Area(3090, 3099, 3487, 3500) || Area(3089, 3090, 3492, 3498) || Area(3248, 3258, 3413, 3428) || Area(3179, 3191, 3432, 3448) || Area(2944, 2948, 3365, 3374) || Area(2942, 2948, 3367, 3374) || Area(2944, 2950, 3365, 3370) || Area(3008, 3019, 3352, 3359) || Area(3017, 3022, 3352, 3357) || Area(3203, 3213, 3200, 3237) || Area(3212, 3215, 3200, 3235) || Area(3215, 3220, 3202, 3235) || Area(3220, 3227, 3202, 3229) || Area(3227, 3230, 3208, 3226) || Area(3226, 3228, 3230, 3211) || Area(3227, 3229, 3208, 3226) || Area(2953, 2999, 3326, 3354); //2999, 3354;
}

public boolean inWild() {
if (inBank() == true) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
}[/quote]is this for like all bases?

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones and pk zones
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Convert this to work with your source, this makes all banks safe and anything beyond the bank is pvp.

public boolean inBank() {
return Area(3090, 3099, 3487, 3500) || Area(3089, 3090, 3492, 3498) || Area(3248, 3258, 3413, 3428) || Area(3179, 3191, 3432, 3448) || Area(2944, 2948, 3365, 3374) || Area(2942, 2948, 3367, 3374) || Area(2944, 2950, 3365, 3370) || Area(3008, 3019, 3352, 3359) || Area(3017, 3022, 3352, 3357) || Area(3203, 3213, 3200, 3237) || Area(3212, 3215, 3200, 3235) || Area(3215, 3220, 3202, 3235) || Area(3220, 3227, 3202, 3229) || Area(3227, 3230, 3208, 3226) || Area(3226, 3228, 3230, 3211) || Area(3227, 3229, 3208, 3226) || Area(2953, 2999, 3326, 3354); //2999, 3354;
}

public boolean inWild() {
if (inBank() == true) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
}
